Entities.Name: Thyroid nodule
Entities.Definition: Mentions of thyroid nodules using various expressions, including references to size or location.

Entities.Name: Cervical lymph nodes
Entities.Definition: Mentions of lymph nodes in the cervical region relevant to thyroid pathology.

Entities.Name: Size numeric
Entities.Definition: Numerical descriptions of the size of thyroid nodules, typically in centimeters.

Entities.Name: Size qualitative
Entities.Definition: Verbal, qualitative descriptions of thyroid nodule size.

Entities.Name: Laterality
Entities.Definition: Describes the side or specific lobe of the thyroid where the nodule is located.

Entities.Name: Location
Entities.Definition: Describes the positional location of a nodule within the thyroid structure.

Entities.Name: Composition
Entities.Definition: Describes the fluid and solid content of the thyroid nodule.

Entities.Name: Echogenicity
Entities.Definition: Describes the ultrasound brightness or reflectiveness of the nodule.

Entities.Name: Margins
Entities.Definition: Describes the boundary characteristics of the nodule.

Entities.Name: Shape
Entities.Definition: Describes the general shape and axis relationship of the thyroid nodule.

Entities.Name: Echogenic foci
Entities.Definition: Mentions of calcifications or reflective artifacts within the nodule.

Entities.Name: Vascularity
Entities.Definition: Descriptions of blood flow within or around the thyroid nodule.

Entities.Name: TIRADS Score
Entities.Definition: Numeric risk score based on the ACR Thyroid Imaging Reporting and Data System (TI-RADS).

Entities.Name: TIRADS risk category
Entities.Definition: Categorical description of the TI-RADS risk level.

Entities.Name: Total number of nodules
Entities.Definition: Mentions of how many thyroid nodules are present.

Entities.Name: Risk description
Entities.Definition: Radiologist’s assessment of the potential malignancy or benign nature of the nodule.

Dataset.Name: UF Health Thyroid Ultrasound Report Corpus
Dataset.Description: Annotated corpus of 490 thyroid ultrasound reports from UF Health used for training transformer-based NER models to extract 16 clinically relevant thyroid nodule characteristics and 27 relations.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotation guidelines were created by thyroid specialists and NLP experts. Entities were labeled using a BIO format and relationships were annotated between nodules and their characteristics. Discrepancies and difficult cases were handled using an iterative panel review process.
